short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically refreshes the current tab based on user-defined interval.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple auto refresh extension that simply works. This extension allows you to set how many minutes you want to wait until your page refreshes. It simply works and has no need for any updates unless Chrome or JavaScript require the syntax to be updated.
